title: Tuesday Post Show (05-31-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (05-31-22)
description:
Lunchbox is upset he wasn’t asked to play in a celebrity softball game. We played a  voicemail from a listener that we couldn’t play on the air. We get an update on the artist who will feature on the new Raging Idiots “Opening Act” song. Allie Colleen revealed something on the BobbyCast about Raymundo that he had no idea about. We get into a deep look at Raymundo’s relationship with gambling. Lunchbox is upset at all different class graduations.  Amy’s daughter has started driver’s education and is ready to start driving.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Lunchbox is upset he wasn’t asked to play in a celebrity softball game. We played a  voicemail from a listener that we couldn’t play on the air. We get an update on the artist who will feature on the new Raging Idiots “Opening Act” song. Allie Colleen revealed something on the BobbyCast about Raymundo that he had no idea about. We get into a deep look at Raymundo’s relationship with gambling. Lunchbox is upset at all different class graduations.  Amy’s daughter has started driver’s education and is ready to start driving.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
